dcterms:creator: A. Piccolo
F. Simone
dcterms:description: A dataset that measures the discomfort glare from windows using the Daily Glare Index (DGI), which quantifies the potential discomfort caused by glare from daylight sources in indoor spaces.
dcterms:title: Daily Glare Index (DGI)

dcterms:creator: A. Facchin
R. Daini
D. Zavagno
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates the glare effect and the impact of age on luminosity thresholds, providing insights into how different age groups perceive lighting.
dcterms:title: Age Groups for Lighting Preferences

dcterms:creator: J. S. Martin
M. Hébert
É. Ledoux
M. Gaudreault
L. Laberge
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the relationship between chronotype, sleep patterns, light exposure, and work-related fatigue among student workers.
dcterms:title: Chronotype and Light Exposure

dcterms:creator: M. G. Figueiro
B. Plitnick
M. S. Rea
dcterms:description: A dataset that examines the effects of chronotype, sleep schedule, and light/dark exposure patterns on circadian phase.
dcterms:title: Chronotype and Light Exposure Studies

dcterms:creator: K. Porcheret
L. Wald
L. Fritschi
M. Gerkema
M. Gordijn
M. Merrrow
S. M. Rajaratnam
D. Rock
T. L. Sletten
G. Warman
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates the relationship between chronotype and environmental light exposure in a student population.
dcterms:title: Chronotype and Environmental Light Exposure
